title: Correction: Resource Availability Modulates the Cooperative and Competitive Nature of a Microbial Cross-Feeding Mutualism
fullText:
The data associated with Figure 3 in S1 Data incorrectly shows the densities of the Trp- strain in co-culture in columns L-Q. It should display the densities of the Leu- strain in co-culture. Please view the correct S1 Data below.
